body:
Comment 6: 
Out for review: https://golang.org/cl/14419054

This CL clarifies the current intent in the spec: We do _not_ require that append shares
the underlying array with the incoming slice, even if that slice's capacity is large
enough. An implementation may want to use different allocation strategies and we don't
want to tie this down in append. If it's important in an application, use copy instead.
_Status changed to **Started**._
